title: Struggling As a Support Main?
body:
Having trouble with annoying assassins like Yasuo, Talon, or Fizz? Don't fret Supporters of the rift, Just  lock in LuLu

Oh no! My Brain dead master Yi forgot to buy boots "I DONT NEED BOOTS IN THE CARRY HERRRRRR"

Throw that speed buff on him and watch the easy ace come rolling out as yi says "OMG EZ IT WAS ALL ME" -lulu nods but says nothing because supports are humble, "gj yi"

Got a fizz try a get frisky with your Caitlyn? Turn that gender confused fish into a rabbit, and toss him in the trash, get outta here fish that's my ADC!!!

Anyone in this forum been to outer space? Well if you're afraid of aliens from nearby stars just use Q and that should slow them down to about a snails pace.. and buy us a few million years of not being invaded, but don't worry the cool down is about as fast as my record time in bed with a woman, that's without CDR!!

Is your ADC playing minecraft, and face tanking every skill shot possible, saying things like "omg Urgot support is broken GG open not" don't worry friends, press R and watch the free LP start coming in.


Just remember Sightstone is always core, boot choices vary, and going AP lulu is meta, her ult gives tons of extra HP, support is a dynamic role and anyone who says supports don't carry is a person who doesn't know how to play league of legends. 

This was a satire post with nuggets of truth, lulu is a very good support to master and can really help you climb if you are bronze or platinum or anything really

Diamond 4 Support main but I play a lot of ADC, but Support role is very near and dear to me.

Currrently Grand Master Support on heros of the storm

And masters level Support on dota2 (retired) 

Mid Masters Overwatch Support (mercy/Lucio) OTP 

Bronze lord Starcraft noob
Plastic 45 on call of duty
Boosted bonobo IRL

Thanks for reading :)
